meta.job_title: CPU Micro-architecture and RTL Design Engineer

duties_responsibilities.duty: Conceive micro-architecture and assist with architecture/product definition
Explore high performance strategies and develop microarchitecture specifications
Development, assessment, and refinement of RTL design to target power, performance, area, and timing goals
Support functional and performance verification of RTL design
Work with multi-functional engineering team to implement and validate physical design aspects

education_certification.credential: Thorough knowledge of microprocessor architecture and related areas
